casebody.data:
STATE OF CONNECTICUT v. DONOVAN DAVIS (14173)

Foti, Laveiy and Landau, Js.

Argued October 31 decision released November 21, 1995 Mary Miller Haselkamp, assistant public defender, for the appellant (defendant). Christopher T. Godialis, deputy assistant state’s attorney, with whom, on the brief, were John A. Con-nelly, state’s attorney, and Corinne Klatt, supervisory assistant state’s attorney, for the appellee (state). PER CURIAM.

The judgment is affirmed.
